title: David A. Arnold: A Joke about His Marriage
description: David A. Arnold jokes about his marriage in his special, "Fat Ballerina". Grab your tickets at NetflixIsAJokeFest.com to see David and your other favorite comedians in the Netflix is a Joke Fest happening April 28th-May 8th in Los Angeles.
author: podcasts@netflix.com (David A. Arnold)
